Hi Noel,

Thank you very much for your feedback and your review! We appreciate the kind words.

You can download your statements as PDFs anytime through our Online Banking services. On your desktop computer, visit egcu.org and log into Online Banking. Once you are logged in, click the "Other Services" menu, then click "eDocuments". From there, you can export any monthly statement as a PDF.

Thanks again for your review,
Emma

1. When someone calls from PNC, they could leave a message.
2. When someone calls to tell you your scheduled payment didn't go through, they should check first. When the scheduled payment is made after you agreed to a payment because of a phone call, you could reimburse the person right away. I was told I had to wait for a check because of the double payment, but the check never came.
3. You could provide an email address for secure messages; the online chat is way too slow. Obviously, talking with someone on the phone doesn't work. (See 2 and 3).

Titre: Beware of PNC non care
commentaire: I have been with pnc fifty years. Sadly their customer service has become non caring. I wrote a check to my daughter. Wrote happy birthday in it. They-without notifying me-bounced it. The check was good and my daughter was charged $20 fee. I spoke for many pnc people and they said it should not have bounced and I wss as bt the $20 refunded plus a reason I was not notified. They escalated the case and the rudest lady Alexis called me - Not caring and I realized pnc is not where I want my money. Alexis told me to make an appointment and close my account. Which I am. Titre: Goodbye, PNC
commentaire:
After many years with PNC, I called it quits because of their dispute process & policies. They almost never sided with me, despite solid evidence of wrongfully being charged by various companies over the years.
Not to mention, they are still on a paper system which is inconvenient.

Titre: They Closed My Credit Card Account
commentaire: I opened a checking account, but my mistake was not to read the schedule of fees. When I realized what was necessary to avoid the maintenance fee of $15 per month, I called to close the account. The lady on the phone was nice. There was no mention of converting my checking account to a different kind of account with lower fees or requirements. A few days later, I received a very curt letter informing me that because of "unacceptable activity on another PNC account" my credit card account was being closed. There was no appreciation for my many years of being a customer. It didn't even say something like, "We regret to inform you." It just went on to express that I still had to pay my bills (of course) and if I didn't, they'd pursue legal action against me per their agreement. And so ... no appreciation for my being a customer ... no regret for closing my account ... no regret for not being able to provide a checking account that would meet my needs ... nothing cordial at all. This letter was a surprise.

Titre: PNC Better Than Other Big Banks
commentaire: I have been with PNC bank for 12 years and have never had any issues. The Virtual wallet account set-up is great for people who want to budget their money. I have recently had dealings with Chase and another bank. When the accounts were new, checks were placed on extended holds as they would be with any bank. Now that I am an established PNC customer, I can deposit a $20000 check today and it‚Äôs available the next morning. The low cash notification is great as well as it prevents me from having items returned for insufficient funds. Sometimes I play it very close to $0 and the low cash setting has saved my tail a few times. I have never had any customer service issues when calling in and have always gotten my questions answered. I have read a lot of the other negative reviews posted here and would expect that some people would have issues here just like anywhere else. People with bad experiences tend to post more than people with good experiences which is why I wanted to leave a 5 star review. All banks have one quirk or another and you just have to decide what is most important to you when choosing a bank.

Titre: Absolutely horrible bank to trust with‚Ä¶
commentaire: Absolutely horrible bank to trust with your needs. We were locked out of our account for well over a month while out of the country. Called customer service hoping to gain access multiple times. However, pnc has no safe guard in there system to gain access without physically going into a branch. So we come back to the states and check our credit rating and pnc had given a derogatory remark dropping us 130 points. We sell commercial real-estate so this had a huge impact on our lives. And there response after running us around for 2 weeks was theres nothing we can do for you. Sorry! We have just retained an attorney as this is a very clear flaw in there online banking system to demand a customer come into a branch physically to gain access to there account after its already been established. Many people travel the country as we do. May not have a car, sickness. Many things that could prevent this from being possible. Yet pnc takes no responsibility or action for its clients to help remedy the situation.
